results.overview: When Dr. Henry Jones Sr. suddenly goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, eminent archaeologist Indiana Jones must team up with Marcus Brody, Sallah, and Elsa Schneider to follow in his father's footsteps and stop the Nazis from recovering the power of eternal life.
results.original_title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
results.title: Indiana_Jones_and_the_Last_Crusade
